When Thulsa catches especially powerful heroes, he forces them to serve him. In return, he gives them immortal bodies they have no control over.

I speak of the tower generals, general's escorts, tower decurions, and zombies in Ebon Tower.

Cut them down and bring back their soultrap shards.

Some of these souls have been forced to serve Thulsa for centuries.

I'll give these to our master smiths. They'll feed them into the heart of the Divine Furnace.

They'll finally be laid to rest with the honor they deserve.
Every one of those horrors was a hero. Destroy them so we can free them.
